name: Bird (itch) (dylankwok)
description:
Bird

Imagine a writing app that doesn't have font choice, formatting, or basically any functions. A text editor that is only one degree different from plain text, with the added frustration that it can't be used to write code.

Bird is that app.

Use its minimalistic save/load features and work on your next great novel anywhere with a stable Internet connection. Ensure no pesky rivals can steal your work, because who tries to steal a rival's novel off itch.io?

Warning: no autosave features.

(In all honesty, this microgame was created to test out the functionality of EasySave's save functions.)
